title: Trimming, early 19th century
medium: White and colored silk in velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: A shield under a crown showing bands of checkerboard (red and yellow) within a red band with yellow crosses.  White ground with green and yellow border stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, early 19th century.
early 19th century. White and colored silk in velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-59.
